mapper.sql: id, repair_prog_id AS repairProgId, code, catagory, pro_name AS proName,ship_name AS shipName,img,pro_order_no AS proOrderNo, pro_desc AS proDesc, faci_name AS faciName, faci_type AS faciType, faci_no AS faciNo, faci_param AS faciParam, faci_src AS faciSrc, repair_position AS repairPosition, repair_position_desc AS repairPositionDesc, damage, repair_tech AS repairTech, repair_tech_desc AS repairTechDesc, create_date AS createDate, create_by AS createBy, update_date AS updateDate, update_by AS updateBy, del_flag AS delFlag, task_status AS taskStatus, view_catagory AS viewCatagory
mapper.select: SELECT detail.catagory catagory,count(*) as allCount, (case detail.catagory when "通用服务" then 1 when "坞修工程" then 2 when "船体工程" then 3 when "机械工程" then 4 when "电气工程" then 5 when "冷藏工程" then 6 when "特种设备" then 7 when "其他" then 8 when "新增" then 9 end ) as sort, SUM(case when detail.task_status=0 then 1 else 0 end) as complete, SUM(case when detail.task_status=1 then 1 else 0 end) as now, SUM(case when detail.task_status=2 then 1 else 0 end) as notStart, SUM(case when detail.task_status=3 then 1 else 0 end) as cancel, cast(SUM(case when detail.task_status=0 OR detail.task_status=3 then 1 else 0 end)/nullif(count(*),0)*100 as decimal(10,2)) as per from t_repair_prog_detail detail where detail.repair_prog_id=#{0} GROUP BY catagory ORDER BY sort
SELECT detail.id,detail.pro_order_no as proOrderNo,detail.task_status as taskStatus FROM t_repair_prog_detail detail where detail.repair_prog_id=#{0} and catagory=#{1} ORDER BY detail.pro_order_no
SELECT pd.id,pd.pro_order_no from t_repair_prog_detail pd where pd.id in ( SELECT d.repair_prog_detail_id FROM t_report_detail d where d.report_id=#{0})
